kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (143.0.7499.169) detected in PATH at C:\ChromeForTesting\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (144.0.7559.133); currently, chromedriver 144.0.7559.133 is recommended for chrome 144.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: TC01 Open Website And Check Title

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

test.doc: เปิดหน้าเว็บไซต์หลักและตรวจสอบ Title ของระบบ

test.name: TC02 Login สำเร็จด้วยบัญชี Passenger

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

test.doc: ทดสอบ flow: Login → /myTrip → แท็บ ยืนยันแล้ว → เลือกทริป → ปุ่ม แจ้งเหตุ → หน้าแบบฟอร์มแจ้งเหตุ

test.name: TC05-1 ฟอร์มแจ้งเหตุ - Validation (เว้น "ประเภทปัญหา")

Alert Message Should Contain

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.arg: window.__lastAlertMessage = null; window.alert = function(msg){ window.__lastAlertMessage = msg; };

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.arg: navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition = function(success, error){ if(error){ error({ code: 1, message: 'User denied Geolocation' }); } };
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Alert Message Should Contain
Execute Javascript
kw.msg: ${text} = คุณไม่อนุญาตให้เข้าถึงตำแหน่ง กรุณาเปิดสิทธิ์ในเบราว์เซอร์
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.arg: คุณไม่อนุญาตให้เข้าถึงตำแหน่ง กรุณาเปิดสิทธิ์ในเบราว์เซอร์
คุณไม่อนุญาตให้เข้าถึงตำแหน่ง กรุณาเปิดสิทธิ์ในเบราว์เซอร์
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

test.doc: ทดสอบปุ่ม "แชทกับ Admin" สำหรับ Driver บนหน้า /myIncidents ว่าสามารถเปิดหน้าระบบแชทได้

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (143.0.7499.169) detected in PATH at C:\ChromeForTesting\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (144.0.7559.133); currently, chromedriver 144.0.7559.133 is recommended for chrome 144.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
